name: SARSCoronavirus2AntigenQualitativeResultsRespiratorySources
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 Antigen Qualitative Results, Respiratory Sources
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to detection of SARS-CoV-2 antigens in respiratory specimens by rapid and unspecified immunoassay.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Incudes detection of SARS-CoV-2 antigens in respiratory specimens by rapid and unspecified immunoassay, with results provided on a qualitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes detection of combined SARS-CoV + SARS-CoV-2 antigens.)
